resources.string:
Local Client:

There is one experimental geth for android Install it and point this to host:127.0.0.1 port:8545 The c++ client compiled with the NDK is a second and ethereumj a third option for a local client

Remote client:

You can remote control ethereum on PC or a Ξπ: Ξthereum on Raspberry Pi

WTF?!?

If you wonder what this is all about you might read the white-paper or watch this TED talk and dig deeper later
